name: Arrow Knight
description:
Once upon a time, there was an arrow knight. This arrow knight had a special talent. He could throw arrows. Why didn't he use a bow? That is lost to legend.  Nonetheless, one day the village got invaded by goblins! They built many Lairs inside the village limits. They needed a hero, and Arrow Knight stepped up. Can you save the community?

Move with Wasd or Arrow Keys. Click in a location to throw an arrow in that direction. There are 25 lairs and one stronghold. The stronghold is invincible until you destroy all the lairs.  Lairs have 10 health each! If you get hit by a goblin, you retreat to the community center and lose a live. As you defeat goblins and plow your way to the stronghold, people will gradually come back to the community. Good luck!

Credits:

Have fun!
